text:
Kattoor is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala, India.
Language.
Malayalam is the native language of Kattoor.
Politics.
Kattoor is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency.
Weather.
The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year.
Transportation.
The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC).
